title: Affliction
description: Avoid the Watchers, stay alive.For Eli and her sister Sil, that means bouncing from planet to planet always a heartbeat from discovery as the Watchers collect those with powers to fuel their brutal war.Surviving is simple: trust no one. But on Nim everything changes.Sil loses control of her powers, forcing Eli to unleash an unknown power of her own. Trapped on a backwater planet with a broken transport, she has no choice but to trust the mysterious Lyrian Flynn, who offers her a deal: use her powers to complete his mission and save Sil from the Watchers.From the moment they meet there's something between them--a strange pull, a magnetic tug. But he's in love with her sister. Saving Sil means struggling to control the powers she never wanted and her feelings for the boy she does.
author: S. Ragle
